name: Galaga Inspired Shooter
description:
This is my first game I developed. Using Unity and inspired knowledge from Galaga, this is a simple space shooter game I created. I would like to add more features (and clean it up) in the future, but this was mainly for educational purposes. Let me know if you see any bugs or if you have any suggestions, thanks!

NOTE: You must play in Fullscreen, the resolution is messed up otherwise.
